title: Assignment
content: Despite doing good in assignment and also having a good attendance I've got less marks in assignment what could be the reason..and how to improve from next sem in these assignmentsüò≠üò≠

comments.body: Approach your teachers, maybe mail them about the same and be ready to submit valid proofs if required.
What is the thing they look for in maths?I did pretty good in matlab exam but ended up scoring low I Don't even know if there exists any other factor for this

Oh math is based on MATLAB solely,at least for us it was.

MATLAB exam actually sucks and you cannot challenge the evaluation, so imo cheer up and cover it up in ESA.

For other subjects you can approach the teachers and get it resolved/negotiate
maths depends on MAT LAB , other subjects usually teachers give full , its better if u are in good books of a teacher or have good connection with them
Were is matlab score displayed .I didnt know results were out
Woah so teachers pet concept doesn't end here tooüò≠üôè
In pesu academy isa result tab

I gave my 100% for all assignment and labs still got 8/10 where as my classmate who doesn‚Äôt even study didn‚Äôt do labs submission properly for 10, this is very unfair alas nothing could be done, just  accept and move on
Yea I've accepted my faith but also need to know how to get full like if there's any way so that from next sem it won't be a prob
